intro: This document serves as a comprehensive nomenclature guideline for the Coastal Zones Land Cover/Land Use (LC/LU) product within the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS). It provides detailed descriptions of all level 5 classes used in the Coastal Zones product, including their geographical characteristics, input datasets, and the methodologies employed for interpreting these classes. The nomenclature is designed to be compatible with other European LC/LU products, while also reflecting the unique characteristics of coastal environments.
